page.title: 10FAMILY PETS HIGH ERCALL
page.content: At home I have got a Budgerigar called Freddy for a pet. It is a yellow and green bird about the size of a Sparrow. He lives in a cage in the Dining Room. It is a big cage so that he has enough room to jump about and exercise. He is fed on seeds Sugar Puffs and water. The food is changed once a day. Everyweek I have to clean out his cage. I asked the other children in our class what pets they had. There are 8 Dogs, 14 Cats, 2 Birds, 34 Hens, 43 Fish, 9 Guinea Pigs, 2 Rabbits and 2 Horses. By Andrew Williams and Paul Watkins
